comprehensive_overview: MPFR is a C library for multiple-precision floating-point computations with correct rounding. It is based on the GNU MP library and enables high precision arithmetic calculations.
core_features:
1. Arbitrary precision floating-point arithmetic
2. Correct rounding and accurate handling of special cases
3. Support for all IEEE 754 floating-point formats
4. Comprehensive mathematical functions
5. Thread-safe and efficient implementation
